node.title: Activists charged after 12-hour protest against Woodside gas project
node.alt: A long-haired, bearded man lying underneath a car.
node.description: Police say the demonstration against theÂ $16 billion Scarborough project endangered the public and drained their resources.
node.content:
["Three protesters have been charged over a demonstration in Western Australia's north that blocked\u00a0access to the country's\u00a0biggest LNG hub\u00a0for more than 12 hours.", "The protesters locked themselves inside concrete barrels in a car and caravan to obstruct the road\u00a0to the Burrup Peninsula, near Karratha,\u00a0at 4am on Wednesday.", "They were demonstrating against this week's announcement from Woodside to press ahead with its $16.5 billion\u00a0Scarborough gas project.", "Specialist police were\u00a0flown in from Perth to help remove the protesters.", "Companies with operations on the peninsula, including Woodside, had to find alternative ways to get workers in an out while the blockade was in place.", "Police said a man and two women were charged overnight with failing to obey a move-on notice, unreasonably obstructing a carriageway and obstructing a public officer.", "", "
The drum that was filled with concrete and set with the protesters' arms inside.(Supplied: Scarborough Gas Alliance)
", "
'Significant drain'
", "Pilbara District Superintendent\u00a0Kim Massam\u00a0said he was\u00a0angry at the way the protesters carried out the demonstration.", "\"There is a right way of doing this and a wrong way, and yesterday was a wrong way,\" he said.", "\"It put people's lives at risk and I'm quite angry.", "\"That was a significant police effort, a significant drain on our resources, a significant drain on emergency services.\"", "", "
Police say the protesters' actions endangered the public and unfairly impacted small businesses.(ABC News:\u00a0James Liveris)
", "Superintendent Massam described the group as \"professional protesters\".", "\"We're very disappointed to see the appearance of Perth-based protesters,\" he said.", "\"It wasn't just Woodside that these protesters affected \u2014 it was a broader community, it was small businesspeople trying to do their job, going around the Pilbara.", "Two of the protesters are expected to appear in court today.", "", "
Woodside is one of the biggest players in\u00a0Australia's oil and gas industry.(Supplied: Woodside)
"]
